summary: Paper map replacements for the World Map
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=5][b]Languages, Compatibility, and Other:[/b][/size]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=4][b]Supported Languages: [/b][/size]
English
[size=3](I apologize for not having the time to update for more languages.  It is important to me that all people can enjoy this mod.  I hope to translate it very soon.)[/size]


[size=4][b]Official Patches and DLC:
[/b][/size]
[b]Compatible with:
Testing on Skyrim Special Edition[/b]
Latest Skyrim Patch
Hearthfire
Dawnguard
Dragonborn

[size=4][b]Incompatible with:[/b][/size]
Old Skyrim Versions
Skyrim Special Edition (looking into this)


[size=4][b]Mod compatibility, Bugs, and other notes:

[/b][/size]
[list]
[*][size=3]Here is a note regarding ENB from user mfjade (thanks for helping):[/size]
[size=3]"for all the enb users:

At the enblocal.ini I set the Key for KeyCombination=0 and KeyUseEffect=77

If i press "m" now the Map appears and ENB is disabled. If I press the "m"
key again ENB activates and the map disappears."[/size][/list]

[list]
[*][size=3]Here's a note from user shaiwan regarding some users experiencing the zoom/pitch bug: ([size=3]thanks for helping):[/size][/size]
[size=3]"I would like to share with the community a solution for the zoom/pitch bug that many have experienced with this map.

**IF** you are using SkyProcPatcher, dual sheath redux or similar, and you
CHANGE any mod in your load order, especially if you decide to remove an
.esp, THEN it can cause this map to not function properly. You may
experience high zoom in your face and pitch angle problem.

Solution: Run BOSS, THEN skyprocpatcher (create new patch), then place this mod
at the bottom of load order and viola, your map is fixed."[/size][/list]

[list]
[*][size=3]When using Sky UI, you may get the "SKY UI Error Code 5". This is because my mod edits the map.swf, as does SkyUI. To disable this error message, do the following:[/size]
[/list][size=3] 1. Esc --> Mod Configuration --> SkyUI --> Advanced.
2. Uncheck the box that says "Map Menu"


[/size][list]
[*][size=3]As far as I am aware, this mod does not need to be cleaned.[/size]
[/list][size=3]

[/size][list]
[*][size=3]This mod needs to be at the bottom of the load order.[/size]
[/list][size=3]

[/size][list]
[*][size=3]The ini provided should not be altered, or the mod may not work properly. The zoom levels are set to values needed for the map to be viewed properly.[/size]
[/list][size=3]

[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Using any lighting mods may cause this mod to not work properly, eg. visual issues, brightness issues[/size]
[/list][size=3]

[/size][list]
[*][size=3]If you are trying to use a different mods "Colored Markers", just install that mod after mine.[/size]
[/list][size=3]

[/size][list]
[*][size=3]The optional remove player marker addon will be zoomed around your players vicinity on the map. I haven't found a way to fix this.[/size]
[/list][size=3]

[/size][list]
[*][color=#FF0000][size=3][b]SOMEWHAT FIXED[/b][/size][/color][size=3] - With the way the 1.8 patch changed some settings, the Custom Map Marker no longer works correctly.[/size]
[/list]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=5][b]Description, Features, and Addons:[/b][/size]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I need to credit nushu, for creating the original mesh, and MoonD for his continued support on nushu's original work. I also need to credit the SkyUI team for decompiling the files needed to make this mod possible.


There are 2 versions available, you can see in-game screenshots in the images tab

[size=4][b]Texture 1:[/b][/size]

This texture has a style similar to the Oblivion map.


[size=4][b]Texture 2:[/b][/size]

Based off the original Skyrim map released by Bethesda, with the following changes

Added rivers.  Highlighted hard to see trails and roads in mountains and other areas.  Relocated the names of locations so that they will not get covered up by map markers. More visible text.  More visible Hold borders.  More visible river and lake's.  Added some waterfalls.  Changes map markers color to better fit style.  Change map marker size.


[size=4][b]Extra maps for new areas, made by Duncanlarsen1:
[/b]
From user Duncanlarsen1
"For anybody still using this mod; I have made addons for Dragonborn and some popular expansion mods.

Dragonborn: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79728/
Falskaar: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74912/
Wyrmstooth: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74601/
The Gray Cowl of Nocturnal: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76210/[/size]


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=5][b]Installation:[/b][/size]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. Move Texture 1 or 2 Main Files to the Skyrim/Data folder

2. If using any of the Addons (Dawnguard/Dragonborn/No Player Marker), you also must download those and put the files in the Skyrim/Data folder, overwriting if necessary.

3. MAKE SURE TO KEEP MY MOD AT THE BOTTOM OF THE LOAD ORDER. NOTHING CAN BE UNDER IT.


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=5][b]Uninstall:[/b][/size]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Remove these files from your Skyrim/Data folder

Warburg's 3D Paper World Map - Texture 1.bsa
Warburg's 3D Paper World Map - Texture 1.esp
Warburg's 3D Paper World Map - Texture 1.ini

OR

Warburg's 3D Paper World Map - Texture 2.bsa
Warburg's 3D Paper World Map - Texture 2.esp
Warburg's 3D Paper World Map - Texture 2.ini

AND (Optional Addons if you installed them)

Warburg's 3D Paper World Map - Dragonborn.bsa
Warburg's 3D Paper World Map - Dragonborn.esp
Warburg's 3D Paper World Map - Dawnguard.esp


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=5][b]Permission:[/b][/size]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please do not use my textures without permission

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=5][b]Credits go to:[/b][/size]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SkyUI team, thank you for your decompiled interface repository

nushu - Creating original Mesh

MoonD - For continuing support and updating with his own enhancements

Duncanlarsen1 - For creating map addons for many other world areas.

[size=3]user mfjade[/size] - Bug fixing

[size=3] user shaiwan[/size] - Bug fixing

user Ovat - Bug fixing

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
